q1.question: What is fractional real estate?
q1.answer: Fractional real estate allows you to own a portion of a property by purchasing shares. Each share represents a percentage of the property's value and entitles you to proportional rental income.

q2.question: How do I receive rental income?
q2.answer: Rental income is distributed automatically to all shareholders proportionally. You can claim your share directly from your dashboard anytime.

q3.question: Is my investment secure?
q3.answer: All transactions are secured by the Stacks blockchain and Bitcoin's proof-of-work. Properties are legally structured through SPVs (Special Purpose Vehicles) for investor protection.

q4.question: Can I sell my shares?
q4.answer: Yes! You can list your shares on our secondary marketplace and sell them to other investors at any time.
